name.description: Specifies the name of the Batch account. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Batch account. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

pool_allocation_mode.description: Specifies the mode to use for pool allocation. Possible values are `BatchService` or `UserSubscription`. Defaults to `BatchService`.

key_vault_reference.description: A `key_vault_reference` block that describes the Azure KeyVault reference to use when deploying the Azure Batch account using the `UserSubscription` pool allocation mode.

storage_account_id.description: Specifies the storage account to use for the Batch account. If not specified, Azure Batch will manage the storage.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The Azure identifier of the Azure KeyVault to use.

url.description: The HTTPS URL of the Azure KeyVault to use.

id.description: The ID of the Batch Account.

primary_access_key.description: The Batch account primary access key.

secondary_access_key.description: The Batch account secondary access key.

account_endpoint.description: The account endpoint used to interact with the Batch service.

create.description: Used when creating the Batch Account.

update.description: Used when updating the Batch Account.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Batch Account.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Batch Account.
